channel.title: Two axoloti board at same time
channel.description: Hey, maybe there is a solution for this but i never found it on the forum. I found that in the board's menu i can choose which board connect/programming but i have the two board nearby and I can not figure out which of the two is connected, no way to see it with red / green LED?

item.title: Two axoloti board at same time
item.dc:creator: @brasso Marc BrassÃ©
item.description:
@brasso wrote:

So am I to understand that the patcher can already be switched from one board to another when multiple boards are running in MIDI / audio parallel or series?

Read full topic

item.title: Two axoloti board at same time
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Power each one up in turn.
You can then give it a name in the select device dialog, then this is displayed when you connect to it in the future.
Note; this friendly name is stored on the axo prefs so needs to be done on each computer you use it one.

On MacOS I also rename the midi device to match

( and put a small label physically on each axo case )

Read full topic
item.source: Two axoloti board at same time
